title: "Vectra AI snaps up identity and SaaS posture management startup Siriux"
excerpt: "Threat detection and response startup Vectra AI Inc. today said it has acquired Siriux Security Technologies Inc., a provider of identity and software-as-a-service posture management. The price of the acquisition was not disclosed."
